text: Remco Campert (28 July 1929 â€“ 4 July 2022) was a Dutch author, poet and columnist. Between 1949 and 1952 Campert drew cartoons for the Dutch magazine Mandrill and Het Parool and in the 1970s for Haagse Post. In 1979 he drew comics for NRC Handelsblad. ==References== ==Other websites== * Lambiek Comiclopedia article about his life and career. * Remco Campert at World Cat Identities Category:1929 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Dutch columnists Category:Dutch poets Category:Writers from The Hague
